pr_title: Improve performance of visual mode with many Ace instances

timeline.message: fix for performance issue with many Ace chunks (WIP)
sort render queue by position; use singleton font measurer
use one measurer per outer editor; avoid resizeobserver loop

timeline.bodyText: Are these APIs available on IE11? (Do we need to worry about IE11 for visual mode, or will we drop support for that in time for the 1.4 release?)
timeline.author: kevinushey
